-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Syntax instance for pretty, the pretty printing library.
--   
@package syntax-pretty
@version 0.2.0.0


-- | Provides a Syntax instance for Text.PrettyPrint.
module Data.Syntax.Pretty

-- | A printer is a function <tt>a -&gt; Either String Doc</tt>.
newtype Printer a
Printer :: (a -> Either String Doc) -> Printer a

-- | Runs the printer.
runPrinter :: Printer a -> a -> Either String Doc
instance SyntaxChar Printer Text
instance Syntax Printer Text
instance SemiIsoFix Printer
instance SemiIsoMonad Printer
instance SemiIsoAlternative Printer
instance SemiIsoApply Printer
instance SemiIsoFunctor Printer
